General.Name: Baotek Industrial Materials Ltd
General.Description: Baotek Industrial Materials Ltd. manufactures and sells fiberglass cloth products in Taiwan, China, Japan, the United States, and internationally. It offers aerospace fiberglass fabric, a reinforcement material for airplanes' internal structure; high temperature filter bag used in power and steel plants, incinerators, and cement factories; fiberglass sunshades for use in buildings, interior designs, construction, and furniture; PTFE fabrics for use in PTFE coating areas; and electronic fiberglass fabrics. Baotek Industrial Materials Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 277, Minfeng Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 326
